person.persName: James Thomas Lawton (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and tavern keeper.)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and tavern keeper. Kentucky native. Married Nancy L. Hewlett Lawton in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on April 2, 1857. Father of Clyde A. Lawton, Charles A. Lawton, and Sarah A. Lawton. Laborer in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860. Tavern keeper in Hopkins County in 1863.
